translation.description: Malaysian Railways Limited, or more commonly known as Keretapi Tanah Melayu Berhad (KTMB), is the oldest railway operator in Malaysia. Today, they operate various services such as KTM ETS and KTM Intercity which help people move across the country with ease. Using data from the KTM Integrated Ticketing System (KITS), this dashboard brings you granular data on ridership on KTMB-operated services.
translation.title: Explore ridership data between any two stations on KTMB-operated services!
